itunes:title: Episode 07 - The Christmas Extravaganza
title: Episode 07 - The Christmas Extravaganza
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: With special guest Evan Hafer.  Mat Best, Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco recall their fondest childhood memories of Christmas that somehow turns into talking about killing people again. We also discuss why you don't EVER wear sandals to a bar.
itunes:summary:
With special guest Evan Hafer.  Mat Best, Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco recall their fondest childhood memories of Christmas that somehow turns into talking about killing people again. We also discuss why you don't EVER wear sandals to a bar.
